plot: Sci-fi animated TV series about space pilot Barry Gallagher, who battles evil alien robots by donning an indestructible suit of space armour, becoming Tekkaman.
plot_en: Sci-fi animated TV series about space pilot Barry Gallagher, who battles evil alien robots by donning an indestructible suit of space armour, becoming Tekkaman.
plot_es: Sci-fi animated TV series about space pilot Barry Gallagher, who battles evil alien robots by donning an indestructible suit of space armour, becoming Tekkaman.
title: Tekkaman the Space Knight
